overview:
Varun Kumar’s major area of expertise is development on LAMP based environments. Starting his career as web designer he then switched to Open source technologies, covering custom PHP4, PHP5 based applications with MySQL back-end. Worked on various web services and APIs to connect the applications to web for updated information.

Aware about the fundamentals and need of frameworks to follow for development, Varun was part of the development team, for building smartData’s own PHP5 based MVC framework and successfully delivered many projects using the same. His technical skill sets include WordPress, Joomla, PHPBB3 and he has hands on experience with CakePHP as a development framework.

Varun has a proven development career with many academic and professional awards/honors during the journey. In addition to the technical development domain, he takes pride in contributing to the training and conversion of raw talent into hard core development professionals.
